abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the UI update link is monitoring UI updates.
overview:
## Discussion

By default, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], which means the system invokes the actions of the UI update link for each UI update.

When the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the UI update link has no effect. Set the value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if you want to temporarily turn off the UI update link.

# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the UI update link is monitoring UI updates.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], which means the system invokes the actions of the UI update link for each UI update.

When the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the UI update link has no effect. Set the value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if you want to temporarily turn off the UI update link.
title: isEnabled
